root: ^I've known a few humans in my time.
^I've liked all of them for different reasons.

about1: ^I feel lighter and brighter when I'm away for a little bit, but in the end, I belong among my people.
about2: ^Aren't you just a pleasant surprise! It warms me up to see someone doing their best!

c-0: ^None of us are anybody in particular, I suppose. Unlike you!
^Spirits! We are spirits. Each slightly different, but all the same.
^We do age, and I've aged a great deal.
c-1: ^Humans! Is that rude to say? You're all marvelously unique.
^I'll have to think on that... I forget things so easily nowadays!
g-0: ^Keep going! You're building a beautiful home.
